channel.title: The Night Star (Video)
channel.itunes:summary: Settle into a space of quiet and comfort. The Night Star is a series of original stories told from an Orthodox Christian perspective, designed to help calm the child. Based on Bible and saint stories, we hope you enjoy these short travels where hope, kindness, peace, joy, and courage are portrayed.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Original, calming stories
channel.itunes:author: Orthodox Answers 4 Kids, and Ancient Faith Ministries

itunes:owner.itunes:name: Orthodox Answers 4 Kids, and Ancient Faith Ministries

item.title: Brittany and Christ Himself
item.description: Meet Brittany who lives in an enchanted village where hope grows like the flowers in spring. Brittany meets Christ who performs a miracle right in front of her. What is it like to witness a miracle? Listen to the story--close your eyes, breathe deeply, and settle into a space of quiet and comfort.
